item.title: Ram Dass: Pioneering Spiritual Teacher, Psychedelic Explorer
item.description: Discover the life and teachings of Ram Dass, the influential spiritual teacher who bridged Eastern wisdom and Western psychology. Learn about his transformative journey with psychedelics, his groundbreaking book "Be Here Now," and how he introduced a new understanding of spirituality to the Western world.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Mastering Attention in NLP
item.description: Dive into the mesmerizing world of neurolinguistic programming (NLP) and explore how the strategic use of misdirection harnesses the power of language to manipulate attention. From cognitive psychology to real-world applications, uncover the secrets and ethical considerations of this powerful communicative tool.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: How to Read People and Understand Body Language
item.description: Learn how to read people and understand body language with these tips and tricks. Improve your communication skills, build stronger relationships, and become a more successful negotiator. üí¨üí™
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: How to Spot a Liar: Understanding Body Language and Verbal Cues üëÄüó£Ô∏è
item.description: Learn how to spot a liar by paying attention to their body language, tone of voice, and words. By understanding these verbal and nonverbal cues, you can become more skilled at detecting when someone is lying. üëÄüó£Ô∏è
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Timothy Leary: The Psychedelic Pioneer Who Expanded Consciousness
item.description: Explore the life and legacy of Timothy Leary, the controversial psychologist and countercultural icon who advocated for the therapeutic and transformative potential of psychedelic drugs
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: The Blushing Phenomenon: Why Do Humans Blush?
item.description: Blushing is a unique human reaction often associated with feelings of embarrassment, shame, or love. In this blog post, we explore the biological and psychological mechanisms behind blushing and its significance in human interactions.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: The Fascinating World of Dreams: Unraveling the Mysteries of Our Sleeping Mind
item.description: Why do we dream? Its a question that has puzzled humans for centuries, inspiring countless theories and sparking the imagination of people across the globe. In this blog post, we delve into the captivating world of dreams and explore the scientific theories behind these enigmatic nocturnal adventures.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)

item.title: Why Do We Yawn? : The Mystery of Yawning
item.description: Yawning is a common yet mysterious behavior that we all experience. In this blog post, we explore the various theories behind why we yawn and the possible functions this seemingly simple act serves.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (ConTechNews)
